title: Overcoming The Odds: Lt. Gov Winsome Sears
itunes:summary:
Lieutenant Governor Winsome Sears shares her incredible story of faith and freedom – detailing how God’s hand has been in her life every step of the way. She also shares about overcoming racial division, education issues, and the value of every human life.

Donate today, and you will help provide ultrasounds to mothers who might otherwise not have access to them. This is an essential step at giving these babies a chance at life. More than 50% of women who receive an ultrasound and counseling choose life! Every $60 you give helps save the life of one innocent baby: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/ffapl-22apr-seelife?refcd=1430205

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/broadcast/overcoming-the-odds-lt-gov-winsome-sears/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
